description:
Igarashi catches Shinozaki in a questionable situation, and to make matters worse she ends up in an embarrassing one! Later on Akiho has her own dilemma to deal with.
Source: Amazon

titles.title: I-I`m Not Saying You Can Take It That Far!
I… Ich habe dir nicht erlaubt, so weit zu gehen!
Je n`ai pas dit que tu pouvais aller jusque-là !
So, Soko made Shite Ii Nante Ittenai!
そ, そこまでしていいなんて言ってないっ!
거, 거기까지 해도 좋다고 하지 않았어!
